mapper.select: select id, order_id, phone, uid, pay_amount, electricity_cabinet_id, old_cell_no, new_cell_no, status, payment_method, source, remark, switch_beginning_time, switch_end_time, create_time, update_time from electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_order where id = #{id}

select id, order_id, phone, uid, pay_amount, electricity_cabinet_id, old_cell_no, new_cell_no, status, payment_method, source, remark, switch_beginning_time, switch_end_time, create_time, update_time from electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_order limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_order(order_id, phone, uid, pay_amount, electricity_cabinet_id, old_cell_no, new_cell_no, status, payment_method, source, remark, switch_beginning_time, switch_end_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{orderId}, #{phone}, #{uid}, #{payAmount}, #{electricityCabinetId}, #{oldCellNo}, #{newCellNo}, #{status}, #{paymentMethod}, #{source}, #{remark}, #{switchBeginningTime}, #{switchEndTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_order
order_id = #{orderId},
phone = #{phone},
uid = #{uid},
pay_amount = #{payAmount},
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
old_cell_no = #{oldCellNo},
new_cell_no = #{newCellNo},
status = #{status},
payment_method = #{paymentMethod},
source = #{source},
remark = #{remark},
switch_beginning_time = #{switchBeginningTime},
switch_end_time = #{switchEndTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
